hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cur_date_time=$(date) sudo bash -c "cat << EOF > /opt/apache-tomcat-7.0.68/webapps/deploy-info.txt deployment_time = $cur_date_time deployment_job_name = $JOB_NAME deployment_job_number = $BUILD_NUMBER EOF"
sudo bash -c "if [ -e /opt/apache-tomcat-7.0.68/webapps/mnt-lab.war ] then rm -fr /opt/apache-tomcat-7.0.68/webapps/mnt-lab.war sleep 5 fi"
sudo wget -P /opt/apache-tomcat-7.0.68/webapps/ http://localhost:8080/jenkins/job/build/$BUILD_NUMBER/artifact/target/mnt-lab.war
